code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,timeout:10000,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export class FlashSaleAPI{static async getStatus(){const response=await api.get('/flash-sale/status');return response.data;}static async attemptPurchase(userId){const response=await api.post('/flash-sale/purchase',{userId});return response.data;}static async checkUserPurchase(userId){const response=await api.get("/flash-sale/purchase/".concat(userId));return response.data;}}
